About.title: About Me
About.content: I am a Software Developer with experience in full-stack development, cloud integration, and performance optimization. I am passionate about building scalable solutions and learning new technologies. I have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering from Tecnológico de Costa Rica.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: The site you are currently visiting! Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Chakra UI, and Framer Motion. Features internationalization and a custom AI-driven development workflow.

cafedostazas.description: A modern landing page for a coffee brand. Features a product carousel, contact integration, and a clean, responsive design.

description: Enhanced performance of 6 critical endpoints, achieving 85–90% speed improvements.
Developed and maintained front-end and back-end features using React, Angular, Spring Boot, and Express.
Integrated Azure Cloud services to support scalable infrastructure.
Collaborated in code reviews and refinement sessions for improved business understanding and solution quality.
Participated in daily team meetings for alignment and coordination across development efforts.
Created and Managed CI/CD pipelines with GitHub.
Volunteered after IBM Call for Code 2022, gaining valuable insights into effective workflow management and advancing front-end development skills.
Collaborated with team members to understand, design, and implement new user-focused features.
Contributed to a client-focused production web application using Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, and MongoDB.
Participated in daily meetings and agile workflows to support collaboration and project velocity.
Took part in peer code reviews, providing constructive feedback to uphold team coding standards.

list.title: Team collaboration
list.description: I thrive in diverse teams, believing that collective intelligence drives the best solutions. My experience at Konrad Group and Plan21 taught me the value of active listening and shared ownership.

list.title: Communication
list.description: Clear and transparent communication is my standard. Whether explaining technical concepts to stakeholders or coordinating with designers, I ensure everyone is aligned.

list.title: Continuous learning
list.description: Technology never stops evolving, and neither do I. I am constantly exploring new frameworks, patterns, and tools to stay at the forefront of development.

list.title: Adaptability
list.description: In the fast-paced tech world, flexibility is key. I quickly adapt to new requirements, tools, and environments, ensuring I can contribute effectively from day one.
